entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, White River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -4.8Â°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
